channel.title: Want to learn HTML? Look here!
channel.description:
I found a cool HTML site, http://www.w3schools.com/html/default.asp
It's free too :)
EDIT: Hopefully posting topics like this is allowed, if not, lock please.

item.title: Want to learn HTML? Look here!
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:6, topic:311913”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=408357.msg3014474#msg3014474 date=1257089152]
Probably the best place to go for learning HTML, as the website was made by W3 (the people that define the HTML standards)
[/quote]
W3C, or the world wide web consortium.

And I don’t thing w3c made w3schools, if you read the copyright notices they’re not registered to the same companies.[/quote]

Sorry, you are right. Refsnes Data made W3Schools, not W3C.

Read full topic
item.source: Want to learn HTML? Look here!

item.title: Want to learn HTML? Look here!
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

ollie123:

Probably the best place to go for learning HTML, as the website was made by W3 (the people that define the HTML standards)

W3C, or the world wide web consortium.

And I don’t thing w3c made w3schools, if you read the copyright notices they’re not registered to the same companies.

Read full topic
